metadata.description: Comprehensive DSA Interview Problems Database - 25-40 problems per pattern
metadata.note: Curated for internship and 0-1 YOE roles at high-paying FAANG companies

sliding_window.description: Optimal for problems involving contiguous subarrays/substrings with dynamic window size

problems.title: Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters
problems.pattern_reason: Classic sliding window with character frequency tracking - find max length substring

problems.title: Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock
problems.pattern_reason: Single pass tracking min price with current profit - optimal sliding pattern

problems.title: Longest Repeating Character Replacement
problems.pattern_reason: Dynamic window resize based on character replacement count constraint

problems.title: Minimum Window Substring
problems.pattern_reason: Complex sliding with two-pointer to find minimal window containing all characters

problems.title: Permutation in String
problems.pattern_reason: Fixed-size sliding window checking frequency match for permutation

problems.title: Sliding Window Maximum
problems.pattern_reason: Deque-based optimization for tracking max in moving window - FAANG favorite

problems.title: Find All Anagrams in a String
problems.pattern_reason: Fixed-size window finding all permutations by character frequency

problems.title: Subarrays with K Different Integers
problems.pattern_reason: At-most-K minus at-most-(K-1) technique for exact K constraint

problems.title: Minimum Size Subarray Sum
problems.pattern_reason: Shrink window from left when sum exceeds target to find minimum length

problems.title: Shortest Subarray with Sum at Least K
problems.pattern_reason: Deque-based sliding for handling negative numbers in sum optimization

problems.title: Max Consecutive Ones III
problems.pattern_reason: Sliding window with K flips constraint - maximize consecutive ones

problems.title: Minimum Operations to Reduce X to Zero
problems.pattern_reason: Transform to find max length subarray - complementary sliding window approach

problems.title: Maximum Number of Vowels in a Substring of Given Length
problems.pattern_reason: Fixed-size window tracking vowel count - simple frequency update

problems.title: Longest Subarray of 1's After Deleting One Element
problems.pattern_reason: At-most-1 zero sliding window for maximum consecutive ones

problems.title: Maximum Erasure of Subarray
problems.pattern_reason: Distinct elements sliding window - same as longest substring without repeating

problems.title: Subarray Product Less Than K
problems.pattern_reason: Two-pointer sliding for product constraint counting valid subarrays

problems.title: Longest Substring with At Most K Distinct Characters
problems.pattern_reason: Maintain K distinct chars in window - classic hashmap sliding pattern

problems.title: Count Number of Homogenous Substrings
problems.pattern_reason: Count consecutive identical chars - mathematical combination with window

problems.title: Check If a String Contains All Binary Codes of Size K
problems.pattern_reason: Fixed-size window collecting all binary subsequences

problems.title: Grumpy Bookstore Owner
problems.pattern_reason: Fixed window optimization - maximize additional satisfied customers

problems.title: Maximum Sum of Two Non-Overlapping Subarrays

problems.title: Minimum Swaps to Group All 1's Together
problems.pattern_reason: Fixed window of size = total ones count to minimize swaps

problems.title: Number of Substrings Containing All Three Characters

problems.title: Best Team With No Conflicts
problems.pattern_reason: Window-based DP after sorting - complex state management

problems.title: Replace the Substring for Balanced String
problems.pattern_reason: Minimum window containing excess characters for balance

problems.title: String With the Longest Equal Character Replacement (Variant)
problems.pattern_reason: Extended character replacement optimization

problems.title: Maximum Points You Can Obtain from Cards
problems.pattern_reason: Complement approach - find minimum middle subarray

problems.title: Find Two Non-overlapping Sub-arrays Each With Target Sum
problems.pattern_reason: Two windows tracking minimum lengths for each target sum

problems.title: Minimum Difference Between Highest and Lowest of K Scores
problems.pattern_reason: Fixed window after sorting - find min difference in K consecutive elements

problems.title: K Radius Subarray Averages
problems.pattern_reason: Fixed-size sliding window computing averages
